NAME

META_POLYLINE

NEAREST API CALL

#include <windows.h>
BOOL32 Polyline
(
	HDC32 hdc,
	const POINT32 *pt,
	INT32 count
);

DESCRIPTION

U16 array noValue
0 no of points
1 each odd until the end x of the point
2 each even until the end y of the point
Polyline, is a list of points, unlike polygon polyline is always unfilled, and can be open.

back
